title: on me by section 15 of the Central Bank and Credit Institutions (Resolution) Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Institutions Resolution
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Institutions Resolution 

Fund Levy (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited credit institution resolution fund levy (amendment) regulation 2024

title: on me by section 15 of the Central Bank and Credit Institutions (Resolution) Act
heading: 2. The Credit Institutions Resolution Fund Levy Regulations 2012 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
2. The Credit Institutions Resolution Fund Levy Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 
381 of 2012) (amended by the Credit Institutions Resolution Fund Levy 
(Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 477 of 2023)) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2 – 

(i) 

in paragraph (1), by the substitution of the following 
definition for the definition of “levy period”: 

“ ‘levy period’ means the period commencing on 1 October 
2024 and ending on 30 September 2025.”, and 

(ii) 

in paragraph (3), by the substitution of “30 June 2024” for 
“30 June 2023”, 

(b) in Regulation 3(1), by the substitution of “1 October 2024” for “1 

October 2023”, 

(c) in Regulation 4(1), by the substitution of “28 February 2025” for 

“29 February 2024”, and 

(d) in Column (3) of the Schedule, opposite Reference Number 5, by 

the substitution of “0 per cent” for “0.012007” percent”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 September, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [476] 3
